description: Novalogy’s first and staple product, AYO, is a pair of smart glasses used for light therapy to help people improve sleep, boost energy levels and beat jet lag.
Pulso Salud is a chain of medical centers specialized in preventive and occupational health services.
Puntaje Nacional-OGR provides students with free access to standardized test preparation and teachers. Its platform tracks students’ growth and personalizes test materials.
Puntored provides financial services to low and middle income customers through a network of “mom and pop shops” throughout Colombia.
Puyo offers puddings and drinks available in 10 unique flavors across 31 malls within the greater Jakarta area.

Qlue is a smart city technology company helping government and private sectors in Indonesia make data-driven decisions by leveraging social media, workforce management, artificial intelligence (AI), computer vision, and internet of things (IoT).
Qraved is Indonesia’s leading food discovery platform, providing users with restaurant information, reviews, recommended dishes with photos, promotions, and instant booking.
QuadMinds is an internet of things (IoT) company that helps clients optimize their supply chain and improve the efficiency of their logistics processes at a competitive cost.

Quantum Talent is a SaaS platform that uses AI to automate the recruiting and selection process to fill operational roles, reducing the cost to hire and the time to fill the vacancy, and substantially improving tenure and performance.
Quero is an online marketplace for higher education that helps students choose, enroll and pay for discounted college programs in Brazil.
Quinoa opened the first chain of healthy food restaurants in Lima, the gastronomic capital of Latin America.
R5 is building a digital bank in Colombia, starting with selling insurance and loans online, to improve customers’ financial health.
Rabbit Hole Distilling is a Kentucky-based bourbon and whiskey distiller inspired by modern approaches to whiskey making.
Rafinera is Turkey’s first packaged daily meal plan service, which caters to clients with special dietary needs and goals.
Raw is the UAE’s first roastery to offer 100% organic and fair-trade coffee. As an end-to-end solution, Raw provides hands-on barista training, customer service, equipment and maintenance.

Raymetrics is a global manufacturer of remote-sensing instruments, called Lidars, that are used by meteorology agencies, factories, and aviation authorities to detect and monitor various chemicals and conditions in real-time.
RDA offers a global renting & fleet management service specifically designed for corporate mobility.
Reclamador operates an online platform that effectively manages the end-to-end process of filing claims against large corporates on behalf of customers on a ‘no-win, no-fees’ basis.
Recorrido is an online bus ticket search and booking platform that leverages passengers’ ratings to ensure quality service.

description: Red e App builds solutions for remote, deskless workforces.
